BigCommerce.title: div.site > main > article > header > h1 > a::text
BigCommerce.author: .author-avatar+ a::text

Cloudbees.title: div > div > div > header > div > h1::text
Cloudbees.author: div > div > div > header > div > div.mb-1::text
Cloudbees.date: div > div > div > header > div > h5 > time::attr(datetime)

Envato.title: .entry-title::text
Envato.author: .fn::text
Envato.date: body > div.page > div > article > header > p > time::attr(datetime)

Erlang-Solutions.title: .mb-sm::text
Erlang-Solutions.author: .ml-1 a::text
Erlang-Solutions.date: #content > header > div > div > ul > li:nth-child(2) > span::text

FindMyPast.title: .post-title::text
FindMyPast.author: body > main > div > section > div > div.authorship-details > div > a::text

Sbg.title: .grid-1-1 h1::text
Sbg.author: div.meet-author > section > header > h1 > a::text
Sbg.date: body > article > section > div.post > header > div > time::attr(datetime)

Algolia.title: section > div > div > div > div > div > h1::text
Algolia.author: div.d-flex.fxd-column.jc-start.color-nebula-300.w-100p > p::text
Algolia.date: section > div > div > div > div > div > div > p::text

Onesignal.title: #site-main > div > article > header > h1::text
Onesignal.author: #site-main > div > article > footer > section > section > h4 > a::text

Pravega.title: article > div.iq-blog-box > div.iq-blog-detail > div.blog-title > a > h1::text
Pravega.author: article > div.iq-blog-box > div.iq-blog-detail > div.iq-blog-meta > ul > li > a:nth-child(1)::text
Pravega.date: article > div.iq-blog-box > div.iq-blog-detail > div.iq-blog-meta > ul > li > a:nth-child(3) > time::attr(datetime)
